commit.message:
Integrate Tiptap editor with watercolor highlight effects

- Replace textarea with Tiptap rich text editor for extensibility
- Add Excalifont hand-drawn font for authentic sketch aesthetic
- Implement watercolor highlight effects using SVG brush strokes
- Support ==text== syntax for highlighting with yellow watercolor marker
- Configure multicolor highlight support for future color variations
- Fix editor layout with flexbox to fill full height and be clickable anywhere
- Add CSS for mark elements with data-color attributes for different brush styles
